tool.name: Paramak to PINN
tool.description: Extract stl faces and body from Paramak STP.
tool.command: cp '$CAD' input.stp && freecadcmd '$__tool_directory__/paramak_to_PINN.py' && mv vessel.stl '$Output_Vessel' && mv inner.stl '$Output_Inner' && mv outer.stl '$Output_Outer' && mv side.stl '$Output_Side'

param.name: CAD
param.label: CAD
param.help: CAD File from Paramak Generator to clean up. Format: STP

data.name: Output_Inner
data.label: Output_Inner
data.help: samplePressureVessel Inner CAD file. Format: stl

data.name: Output_Outer
data.label: Output_Outer
data.help: samplePressureVessel Outer CAD file. Format: stl

data.name: Output_Side
data.label: Output_Side
data.help: samplePressureVessel Side CAD file. Format: stl

tool.help: This tool takes in a 3D STEP file from paramak, cleans up the geometry and generate the necessary files for the Modulus PINN.
